title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to a playlist from an embedded video
description:
Users will be able to add a video to a playlist directly from embedded videos across Microsoft 365 (SharePoint pages, Outlook, teams, Viva Engage, etc.) without having to open the video in Stream.

We have adjusted our priorities to focus on delivering experience improvements that better align with customer needs and as a result, this feature has been removed from our public roadmap for now.
